Project Description
Goal: an app to collaboratively make beats on a Windows 8 tablet


Milestones:
  1. Build a basic sampler that can create songs by sequencing sounds into rhythms
    • a basic sampler
      • I can record sound and save the result as a WAVE file - ok
      • I can play saved sounds - ok
    • can create songs
      • I can save the song - ok
      • I can open a saved project and continue editing - ok
    • by sequencing sounds into rhythms
      • I can set and change the tempo of the song - ok
      • I can manually or in real time sequence sounds on a timeline - in progress
      • I can loop the song - ok
  2. Add feature to collaborate on the same song in a basic turn-based fashion
    • collaborate on the same song
      • I can edit a project from another user on a different tablet
    • in a basic turn-based fashion
      • I can share a project with another user on a different tablet
